body_html: @mrry do you think it would be reasonable to put grpc_tensorflow_server.cc into a library that Keno could put into his build rule, so that he could avoid adding any C++ here (i.e., stop duplicating the code for main() here)? Or is it better just to duplicate it and leave things alone in the rpc directory?
body_text: @mrry do you think it would be reasonable to put grpc_tensorflow_server.cc into a library that Keno could put into his build rule, so that he could avoid adding any C++ here (i.e., stop duplicating the code for main() here)? Or is it better just to duplicate it and leave things alone in the rpc directory?
body: @mrry do you think it would be reasonable to put grpc_tensorflow_server.cc into a library that Keno could put into his build rule, so that he could avoid adding any C++ here (i.e., stop duplicating the code for main() here)? Or is it better just to duplicate it and leave things alone in the rpc directory?
